messages.message:
Brian
I need you.
I don't know anything about being a parent.
Sharon Tobin accepted your request.
Sorry?

Brian
What is the hardest part about being a parent?
Why are you asking?

Brian
My wife and I are thinking of having kids this year and I don't have anyone else to talk to about this.
lol kids are great. I adore parenting it's just the most amazing experience. However good you think it will be.. it's better

Brian
That's really inspiring.
It's true. I thought it would be magical and everyday filled with bliss simply because they exist.. it is better than I ever imagined.

Brian
I was raised Catholic by my mother and I am seriously considering not passing that tradition on.
Yeah.. don't

My daughter goes to a Protestant school. As a result i have to go to church as part of school events. Big difference between that and Catholicism. None of the marble floors and gold thrones, just basic and the service was relaxed. I am very against catholism but I'm Irish and we all know what they did here

Brian
I appreciate that.  I stopped going to my church for exactly the same reason!
They could do so much to help everyone but they spend it all on luxury.
Why do you think that is?

My sister was in the Vatican and said the amount of money is unbelievable, they have a well where people throw in money and that alone had a ton of cash in it.
They are a business and a profitable one.

Brian
Exactly!  It's a marketing problem.  Not everyone is as smart as you are.
lol I don't think so

Brian
Made you laugh

Brian
You have transcended the need for bright beautiful gold coatings.  Jesus had that attribute too, just watch the Last Crusade for more information.  You don't need the glitter.  But the people around you do.  How can you get them to look past the shiny surface and realize it only matters what they believe and what their convictions are?
I don't understand

Brian
You don't need the gold-plated chairs, but stupid people do.  It's a recruiting tactic.  What can you do to recruit positivity in to your life?
